subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] All In One Device
author: RetroCom
full_text:
Can you define with some detail "all ways" ?

--- seanjankowski1@... wrote:

From: "seanjankowski1" <seanjankowski1@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EVP-ITC] All In One Device
Date: Wed, 25 Jun 2008 15:10:33 -0000

This is my first post. I was wondering if anyone had created an all in
one ITC EVP device. I know that researchers such as Seidle had created
the psychophone that seemed to cover many aspects of ITC but I have
yet to see all ways of communication in one device.

I have created an all in one design that covers most of the devices
used. If you wish I will share the design.
